aboutText: Gaston Ibarroule is a sound designer and music composer from Neuqu√©n, Argentina, based in Berlin, Germany, since 2015. His career in the world of sound began through music, playing guitar and singing from an early age. Driven by a broad interest in the field, he has developed in different areas including sound design, music composition and production, field recording, dialogue and effects editing and mixing. His body of work spans short and feature-length fiction films, documentaries, experimental films, as well as television, streaming and advertising.
homeIntro: Sound designer & Composer from Argentina, based in Berlin. My work spans film, series, documentary, art installations, TV & ads.
